title: Daisy Bell
character: Daisy Bell, a cheerful singer in a vintage dress
setting: A sunlit Victorian park with a gentle pathway and flowers
action: Daisy pedals a tandem bicycle while singing, petals float around in rhythm

timeline.setup: Daisy and the bicycle fade into the park scene
timeline.middle: She pedals forward as musical notes sway around
timeline.conclusion: Scene settles with Daisy waving and notes fading out
